items.sentence: Tom told me I should spend more time with my family.
Why don't you try doing that the way Tom showed you?
Protesters clashed with police at the demonstration.
Tom didn't wake up in time to catch the first train.
I hope that the police catch the guy who stabbed me.
Foreign investors withdrew their money from America.
I couldn't understand what prevented me from moving.
I can only walk about three kilometers at a stretch.
I must admit that the thought hadn't occurred to me.
I could spend the whole day kissing and hugging you.
